step.datasource:
INSERT INTO _AB_Quotations SELECT distinct BacoID, hid as Bacohid, OrkrgID, ordernr , Taalcode , emailto, '' as bccto, --, ISNULL(email_replyto,'') as bccto -- , 'Quotation_' + ltrim(rtrim( ordernr)) + '.pdf' as filename CASE WHEN taalcode = 'DE' THEN 'Angebot_' WHEN taalcode ='NL' THEN 'Offerte_' ELSE 'Quotation_' END + ltrim(rtrim( ordernr)) + '.pdf' as filename
, CASE WHEN taalcode = 'DE' THEN 'Angebot: ' WHEN taalcode ='NL' THEN 'Offerte: ' ELSE 'Quotation: ' END + LTRIM(ordernr) as subject, 0 as retrievestatus, 0 as mailstatus, '%runid%' as runid, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as syscreated , fullname as email_displayname, --ISNULL( email_replyto, 'iss@orlaco.com') as email_replyto 'iss@orlaco.com' as email_replyto FROM ( SELECT b.ID as BacoID, b.hid, oh.id AS OrkrgID, oh.ordernr, '_' + ltrim( rtrim(b.ordernumber)) + '.pdf' as filename , CASE WHEN oh.ord_landcode = 'DE' THEN 'DE' ELSE isnull(taal_ord_contact.taalcode, 'EN') END Taalcode , ISNULL(oh.ord_contactemail , h.mail) as emailtoFUTURE, h.mail as emailto, ord_contactemail , oh.docnumber , h.fullname , h.mail as email_replyto FROM (SELECT top 100 MAX(b2.hid) as max_hid, oh2.ordernr FROM dbo.BacoDiscussions as b2 with (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.orkrg as oh2 WITH (NOLOCK) on oh2.ordernr = b2.ordernumber and ord_soort = 'Q' WHERE 1=1 --AND a.id IS NULL AND b2.type = 13 AND b2.Document is not null AND oh2.orddat > '2015-04-02 00:00:00.000' AND b2.filename like '%.pdf' AND b2.CreatedDate > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 1 GROUP BY oh2.ordernr ) bMax INNER JOIN dbo.BacoDiscussions as b WITH (NOLOCK) on b.HID = bMax.max_hid INNER JOIN dbo.orkrg as oh WITH (NOLOCK) on oh.ordernr = b.ordernumber and ord_soort = 'Q' INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS ci WITH (nolock) ON oh.fakdebnr = ci.debnr LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT dbo.cicmpy.debnr, MIN(cicntp.taalcode) as taalcode FROM dbo.cicmpy WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.cicntp WITH (nolock) ON dbo.cicmpy.cmp_wwn = dbo.cicntp.cmp_wwn and cicmpy.cmp_type in ('C', 'R') and dbo.cicmpy.cnt_id = dbo.cicntp.cnt_id
GROUP BY dbo.cicmpy.debnr ) AS taal_ord_contact ON oh.debnr = taal_ord_contact.debnr INNER JOIN dbo.humres h with(nolock) on oh.sysmodifier = h.res_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo._AB_Quotations a (NOLOCK) on a.ordernr = oh.ordernr WHERE 1=1 --AND a.BacoID IS NULL and b.id not in (select bacoid from _ab_quotations) ) S

SELECT top 100 a.filename, CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), a.BacoID) as ID FROM _AB_Quotations a (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 and a.runid = '%runid%' AND a.mailstatus = '0' --and a.runid = '033FC584-6B7F-4F07-9D65-B40E4A89B703' --and a.syscreated > current_timestamp - 1
step.stepname: Offerte bijlage ophalen en opslaan als PDF -----

step.datasource: SELECT top 100 orkrgID as ID, rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) as Taalcode, case when rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) = 'NL' then 'Voorwaarden' when rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) = 'DE' then 'Konditionen' else 'Terms' END as Terms, Filename FROM _AB_Quotations a (nolock) WHERE 1=1 AND a.runid = '%runid%' AND a.mailstatus = '0'
step.stepname: ------ ! Voorwaarden Rapport genereren en opslaan als PDF----

step.datasource: SELECT top 100 orkrgID as ID, rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) as Taalcode , ltrim(rtrim(ISNULL(emailto, 'iss@Orlaco.com'))) as emailto , bccto, ISNULL(email_replyto, 'iss@Orlaco.com') as email_replyto, ISNULL(email_displayname, 'Orlaco') as email_displayname, case when rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) = 'NL' then 'Voorwaarden' when rtrim(ltrim(Taalcode)) = 'DE' then 'Konditionen' else 'Terms' END as Terms , subject, a.filename, Case when a.Taalcode = 'NL' then 'Metaalunie_voorwaarden_NL' When a.Taalcode = 'DE' then 'Metaalunie_Konditionen_DE' else 'Metaalunie_Conditions_EN' END as Filecond FROM _AB_QUOTATIONS a (nolock) WHERE 1=1 AND a.runid = '%runid%' --AND a.runid = 'CB584F19-F0EE-4D55-A4E5-BBAEEAD60932' AND a.mailstatus = '0'
step.stepname: ------ ! Rapport Begeleidend schrijven genereren en mailen

step.datasource:
select distinct --Q.bacoid as id,
'C:\ABSC\Offerte job\Orlaco_Gmbh_'+Q.filename as filename, 'Offerte_' + Q.ordernr as subject, 105 as type, o.syscreator, o.syscreator as empid, dvd.account as cmpwwn ,Q.ordernr as Ourref from _AB_Quotations Q (nolock ) inner join orkrg O (nolock) on Q.ordernr = O.Ordernr inner join bacodiscussions bc (nolock) on Q.bacoid = bc.id Inner join cicmpy C (Nolock) on o.debnr = c.debnr Left outer join cisect sct (Nolock) on c.sct_code = sct.sct_code inner join [Orlaco]..DivisionDebtors dvd (nolock )on ltrim(o.debnr) = dvd.debtor and dvd.Division in ('483','482') inner join [Orlaco]..cicmpy Csy (Nolock) on dvd.account = csy.cmp_wwn --inner join cicntp cpgl (nolock) on o.ord_contactperson = cpgl.cnt_l_name --left outer join [Orlaco]..cicntp cpsy (nolock) on dvd.account = cpsy.cmp_wwn and cpsy.administration = '400' --and o.ord_contactperson = cpsy.cnt_l_name COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS and cpgl.FullName = cpsy.fullname COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS
inner join [ABEI].._AB_entity_results ABEI on Q.runid = '%runid%' and jobid = '%jobid%' --'316' where mailstatus = '0'

select distinct ab.id, 213 as type, case when o.sysmodifier = '10152' then '999999' else o.sysmodifier END as sysmodifier , '2 because of received information' as FreetextField_01, dateadd(dd,+14,o.orddat) as freedatefield_03 , dvd.account as CustomerID,
Case when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Agriculture%' then '1 Agriculture' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Airport%' then '2 Airport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Body Builders%' then '3 Body Builders' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Crane Applications%' then '4 Crane Applications' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Dangerous Goods%' then '5 Dangerous Goods' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Explosion Safe%' then '6 Explosion Safe' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Firetrucks%' then '7 Firetrucks' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Forklift Applications%' then '8 Forklift Applications' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Governemental%' then '9 Governemental' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Heavy Equipment%' then '10 Heavy Equipment' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Maritime%' then '11 Maritime' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Military%' then '12 Military' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Onroad Trucks%' then '13 Onroad Trucks' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Public Transport%' then '14 Public Transport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Railway%' then '15 Railway' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Road Construction%' then '16 Road Construction' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Unknown%' then '17 Unknown' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%PUBLIC TRANSPORT%' then '18 Public Transport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Retrofit USA%' then '19 Retrofit USA' ELSE '17 Unknown' END as freetextfield_02
--isnull(cpsy.cnt_id, csy.cnt_id) as Customercontactid,
,o.ord_contactperson as FreeTextField_08 ,o.refer as description, o.docnumber as FreeTextField_05, '2 Recommendation' as FreeTextField_06, o.ord_contactemail, DATEADD(mm, +2, O.orddat )as freedatefield_01, O.orddat as freedatefield_02, bdr_ev_val as FreeNumberField_01, o.ordernr as freeintfield_01, bcsy.id as FreeGuidField_06 from _AB_Quotations Q (nolock ) inner join orkrg O (nolock) on Q.ordernr = O.Ordernr Inner join cicmpy C (Nolock) on o.debnr = c.debnr Left outer join cisect sct (Nolock) on c.sct_code = sct.sct_code inner join [Orlaco]..DivisionDebtors dvd (nolock )on ltrim(o.debnr) = dvd.debtor and dvd.Division in ('482','483') --inner join [Orlaco]..cicmpy Csy (Nolock) on dvd.account = csy.cmp_wwn --inner join cicntp cpgl (nolock) on o.ord_contactperson = cpgl.cnt_l_name --left outer join [Orlaco]..cicntp cpsy (nolock) on dvd.account = cpsy.cmp_wwn and cpsy.administration = '400' --and o.ord_contactperson = cpsy.cnt_l_name COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS and cpgl.FullName = cpsy.fullname COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS inner join [ABEI].._AB_entity_results ABEI with (nolock) on ABEI.runid = '%runid%' and ABEI.jobid = '%jobid%' and jobstepid = '1743' inner join [Orlaco]..bacodiscussions bcsy with (nolock) on abei.NewKeyvalue = bcsy.id and Q.ordernr = bcsy.ourref inner join [Orlaco]..absences ab with (nolock) on Q.ordernr = ab.FreeIntField_01 and ab.type = '213' where mailstatus = '0' --and o.ordernr in (select a.freeintfield_01 as ordernr from [orlaco]..absences a with (nolock) -- inner join orkrg o (nolock) on a.freeintfield_01 = o.ordernr -- where a.type = '213')

select distinct --bacoid as id, 213 as type, '999999' as syscreator, o.syscreator as empid, --o.represent_id as empid,
'2 because of received information' as FreetextField_01, dateadd(dd,+14,o.orddat) as freedatefield_03 , dvd.account as CustomerID,
Case when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Agriculture%' then '1 Agriculture' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Airport%' then '2 Airport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Body Builders%' then '3 Body Builders' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Crane Applications%' then '4 Crane Applications' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Dangerous Goods%' then '5 Dangerous Goods' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Explosion Safe%' then '6 Explosion Safe' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Firetrucks%' then '7 Firetrucks' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Forklift Applications%' then '8 Forklift Applications' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Governemental%' then '9 Governemental' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Heavy Equipment%' then '10 Heavy Equipment' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Maritime%' then '11 Maritime' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Military%' then '12 Military' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Onroad Trucks%' then '13 Onroad Trucks' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Public Transport%' then '14 Public Transport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Railway%' then '15 Railway' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Road Construction%' then '16 Road Construction' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Unknown%' then '17 Unknown' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%PUBLIC TRANSPORT%' then '18 Public Transport' when sct.ml_desc_0 like '%Retrofit USA%' then '19 Retrofit USA' ELSE '17 Unknown' END as freetextfield_02
--isnull(cpsy.cnt_id, csy.cnt_id) as Customercontactid,
,o.ord_contactperson as FreeTextField_08 ,ISNULL(o.refer, '-') as description, o.docnumber as FreeTextField_05, '2 Recommendation' as FreeTextField_06, o.ord_contactemail, DATEADD(mm, +2, O.orddat )as freedatefield_01, O.orddat as freedatefield_02, bdr_ev_val as FreeNumberField_01, o.ordernr as freeintfield_01, o.syscreated, bcsy.id as FreeGuidField_06 from _AB_Quotations Q (nolock ) inner join orkrg O (nolock) on Q.ordernr = O.Ordernr Inner join cicmpy C (Nolock) on o.debnr = c.debnr Left outer join cisect sct (Nolock) on c.sct_code = sct.sct_code inner join [Orlaco]..DivisionDebtors dvd (nolock )on ltrim(o.debnr) = dvd.debtor and dvd.Division in ('482','483') --inner join [Orlaco]..cicmpy Csy (Nolock) on dvd.account = csy.cmp_wwn --inner join cicntp cpgl (nolock) on o.ord_contactperson = cpgl.cnt_l_name --left outer join [Orlaco]..cicntp cpsy (nolock) on dvd.account = cpsy.cmp_wwn and cpsy.administration = '400' --and o.ord_contactperson = cpsy.cnt_l_name COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS and cpgl.FullName = cpsy.fullname COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS inner join [ABEI].._AB_entity_results ABEI with (nolock) on ABEI.runid = '%runid%' and ABEI.jobid = '%jobid%' and jobstepid = '1743' inner join [Orlaco]..bacodiscussions bcsy with (nolock) on abei.NewKeyvalue = bcsy.id and Q.ordernr = bcsy.ourref where mailstatus = '0' and o.ordernr not in (select a.freeintfield_01 as ordernr from [orlaco]..absences a with (nolock) inner join orkrg o (nolock) on a.freeintfield_01 = o.ordernr where a.type = '213')

select ab.id, ab.hid, bdr_ev_val as FreeNumberField_02, '05 Order - other' as FreeTextField_03, 4 as status, ab.empid as realizer from orkrg Q (nolock) inner join [Orlaco]..absences ab with (nolock) on Q.offerte_nr = ab.FreeIntField_01 and ab.type = '213' where 1=1 and Q.offerte_nr = Q.ordernr and AB.status = '1' and Q.ord_soort = 'V' --and ordernr = '11709870'
step.stepname: Synergy Sales & Quotation update na order

step.datasource: select ab.id, 4 as status, ab.empid as realizer, 0 as FreeNumberField_02, '16 Lost - no response' as freetextfield_03 from orkrg Q (nolock) inner join [Orlaco]..absences ab with (nolock) on Q.ordernr = ab.FreeIntField_01 and ab.type = '213' where 1=1 and AB.status = '1' and Q.ord_soort = 'Q' and resulttype = 'R'
step.stepname: ------ ! Synergy Sales & Quotation update na verwerpen

step.datasource: Select ae.runid, ab.freeintfield_01 as offerte, ab.hid as Requestnr, FreeTextField_04 as Offerte_Status, Case when ab.status = '4' then 'gerealiseerd' when ab.status = '1' then 'Goedgekeurd' else 'Status onbekend' END as Status_verzoek, Case when ae.rowstatus = '2' then 'Succes' when ae.rowstatus = '-1' then ae.errormessage END AS Status_bijwerken_verzoek ,concat(isnull(h.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, 'ISS@orlaco.com'), ',',isnull(hc.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, 'ISS@orlaco.com'), ',',isnull(hm.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT , 'ISS@orlaco.com')) mail from _AB_Entity_results AE inner join [orlaco]..absences AB on AE.keyvalue = CAST(Ab.id AS VARCHAR(50)) left join [orlaco]..humres h with(nolock) on h.res_id = ab.empid left join [orlaco]..humres hc with(nolock) on hc.res_id = ab.syscreator left join [orlaco]..humres hm with(nolock) on hm.res_id = ab.sysmodifier where AE.jobid = '%JOBID%' and AE.jobstepid in ('1746','1747') and ae.runid = '%runid%'
step.contentbody:
Dear colleague,

A Quotation has been accepted or rejected in Exact Globe. The following report shows the status of the  'SAL: Information and Quotation ' workflow request which is related to the quotation:

 

Offerte Requestnr Offerte_Status Status_verzoek Status_bijwerken_verzoek
## Query Table Content ##

 

If an error appears in de column 'Status bijwerken verzoek', then the workflow request has not been created or updated. Check the data in the quotation and reprint the quotation or manually update the Synergy request.

 

Kind regards,

The Administrator
step.settings: uniquekey=runid;retryunique=1;emailfrom=abei@orlaco.com;emailname=ABEI @ EWS01;emailreplyto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=%mail%;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=Status werkstroomverzoek 'SAL: Information and Quotation' n.a.v. promoveren / verwerpen offerte in Globe;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=offerte,Requestnr,Offerte_Status,Status_verzoek,Status_bijwerken_verzoek;mex_connectionid=0;emailsplitcolumn=mail;
step.stepname: Mail sturen bij order of verwerpen

step.datasource: Select ae.runid, ab.freeintfield_01 as offerte, ab.hid as Requestnr, FreeTextField_04 as Offerte_Status, Case when ab.status = '4' then 'gerealiseerd' when ab.status = '1' then 'Goedgekeurd' else 'Status onbekend' END as Status_verzoek, Case when ae.rowstatus = '2' then 'Succes' when ae.rowstatus = '-1' then ae.errormessage END AS Status_bijwerken_verzoek ,concat(isnull(h.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, 'ISS@orlaco.com'), ',',isnull(hc.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, 'ISS@orlaco.com'), ',',isnull(hm.mail COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT , 'ISS@orlaco.com')) mail from _AB_Entity_results AE inner join [orlaco]..absences AB on SUBSTRING(newkeyvalue,2,36) = CAST(Ab.id AS VARCHAR(50)) left join [orlaco]..humres h with(nolock) on h.res_id = ab.empid left join [orlaco]..humres hc with(nolock) on hc.res_id = ab.syscreator left join [orlaco]..humres hm with(nolock) on hm.res_id = ab.sysmodifier where AE.jobid = '%JOBID%' and AE.jobstepid in ('1744', '1745') and ae.runid = '%runid%'
step.contentbody:
Dear colleague,

 

A Quotation has been created or updated. The following report shows the status of the related Synergy 'SAL: Information and Quotation' workflow request:

 

Offerte Requestnr Offerte_Status Status_verzoek Status_bijwerken_verzoek
## Query Table Content ##

 

If an error appears in de column 'Status bijwerken verzoek', then the workflow request has not been created or updated. Check the data in the quotation and reprint the quotation or manually update the Synergy request.

 

Kind Regards

The Administrator
step.stepname: Mail sturen bij aanmaken / update Request

step.datasource: select --a.hid, a.Status, a.Description, a.FreeIntField_01, a.syscreator, a.FreeGUIDField_06 TOP 30 o.ID, o.ordernr, CONVERT(varchar,a.hid) + ' - ' + ISNULL(a.FreeTextField_03,'No Status') as DeletionReason from [orlaco]..absences a INNER JOIN orkrg o with (NOLOCK) on a.FreeIntField_01 = o.ordernr where a.Type = 213 and -- all SIAQ request --a.syscreator = 999999 and -- created by sqlservice a.Status in(2,3,4) and -- with status processed or rejected a.FreeGUIDField_06 IS NOT NULL and -- with a printed quote document attached a.sysmodified < DATEADD(MONTH,-3,GETDATE()) and -- and 3 months closed --a.FreeTextField_03 like '1%' and -- the request status is 1x - Order Lost o.ord_soort = 'Q' and -- and related quotation in Globe is not an order o.afgehandld = 0 and -- and it is still open a.FreeTextField_03 <> '20 Template' ORDER BY o.id
